infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: MacroLog needs access to Apple Health to read your nutrition data.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: MacroLog needs access to Apple Health to save your meal nutrition data (calories, protein, carbs, and fat).
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: MacroLog needs camera access to take photos of your meals for nutrition analysis.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: MacroLog needs photo library access to save your meal photos.
